level.heading: Penalty for misrepresentation.
level.text: Any person who willfully makes any false or misleading statement or representation for the purpose of obtaining any benefit or payment under this chapter shall be guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction thereof shall be punished by a fine of not to exceed $1,000 or by imprisonment of not to exceed 1 year, or by both such fine and imprisonment.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-77
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-77, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 32-1501.
